Thanks for reporting. Do you still have access to the logs from where you synced the `tg` from the beginning? I have recently found that we had some destructive behaviour that was not removed that caused some blocks to be removed. If you have logs, could you search for `Rolled back chain segment`. If you have this message for around the blocks you are missing, this is the reason. It has been fixed here: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/turbo-geth/pull/1024, but unfortunately, we do not have a procedure to repair these missing blocks. So the only way to get them back quickly is to resync from scratch

No, it was running in screen session without logging...
What's the best way to drop everything? just remove ~/.local/share/turbogeth/ ?
Remove the `chaindata` directory, but leave all other directories, so that you don't need to redo node database
